description: A React component named EmptyState that renders an empty or loading state display, including optional description and loading spinner.

methods.name: EmptyState({ title = 'No results', description, loading = false })
methods.description: React functional component that displays either a loading spinner with message or an empty state with title, optional description, and icon.
